Text:
Can anyone confirm that the 7.1 audio actually works?  I've setup my speakers to 7.1 mode (I have a creative xtreme music and vlc to 7.1 but there are no audio in both side left and side right channels.  This is just like a regular 5.1 track.  OR do I have to install anything to make the 7.1 audio work?

I dled this specifically to hear the 7.1....
The output should be 7.1 from your system/codec audio settings.
